author: mgreenegit
body: The current implementation of New/Test-ScriptFileInfo creates a PSPrivateData section that accepts a string value.  Module manifests accept a hashtable of values.  For consistency, these should be the same.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
@mgreenegit can you open the issue here?  https://github.com/powershell/powershellget/issues

Thanks!

title: scriptfileinfo psprivatedata is not consistent with module manifests
